column4: Anyone know how to have Ubuntu/Gnome auto-logout after x minute of inactivity?
there is a way that after x minutes it goes to a screen saver which requires you enter your password. other users can still log in if they encounter this screen by selecting "switch user"
yeah I guess thats good enough
it is essentially the same function, only if you want to log back in after inactivity, it's easier for you.
